description: Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of 3 Radomes
full_summary:
### Title
**Radome Replacement, Installation, Removal, and Disposal**

#### Official Notification of Proposed Procurement
[Annex: PW-22-01006956 / Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/dd464ca107755dd713a4e6e58ccfed2a/w8485-237359a_ccr_radome.pdf)

The Department of National Defence has issued a call for proposals to supply three (3) Radomes, installation of new purchased Radomes, and removal and disposal of existing ones.

#### Contractual Clauses and Classification
This notice includes classified information related to the Industrial Security Program (ISP), Public Works and Government Services Canada. Bidders are expected to refer to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) website for more information on security requirements.

**Security Clauses Qualification:**
Due to the classified nature of this contract, participation is restricted to companies holding a valid security clearance. In accordance with the governing Security Act, potential bidders will need to apply to achieve qualification. Bidders should consult the PSP- CIOM site for further information.

#### Geographical Scope
Canada, specifically British Columbia, Nova Scotia, and Newfoundland and Labrador

#### Key Dates

*   **Publication Date:** 2022-09-13
*   **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-05
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-12T14:00:00

#### Contact
Barabe, Annick
Director
Contracting Director
[Email: annick.barabe@forces.gc.ca](mailto:annick.barabe@forces.gc.ca)

This entry contains sensitive information due to existing classifications restrictions.

Note:   People accessing this notice should be aware of their security clearance. Misuse of government product information may invite law suits. The sole responsibility for the interpretation of any notice of proposed procurement lies with the entity submitting the proposal.

Leave a comment below with any questions or further feedback.

[(Original source DMID)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/document/PW-22-01006956/Ammendment/2?)
